metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38248 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Nagios XI before v5.8.7 was discovered to contain multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities at auditlog.php.

criterions.comment: icinga: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
nagios3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
